# Reference Scaffold For
## Feel free to clone/fork

* gulp
* es6 / babelify
* bower / browserify
* angular / templateCache
* eslint
* skeleton.css grid layout

# Common Tasks

* gulp serve
* gulp serve:dist

# Disclaimer

Probably does not use best practices for es6/angular.
